Node.definition: literally: to cause (something) to fall (to someone); hence: = causative process by which humans or deities cause land to become someone else's property

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
literally: to lift up; hence: = causative action by which humans devote certain things to a deity
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= the greater or greatest of two or more dimensions of an object
= state in which a countable entity is five in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= the greater or greatest of two or more dimensions of an object
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= a set of limits that separates part of a whole from other parts, with focus either on the limits itself or on the area or object surrounded by it
= the tabernacle or temple of YHWH, described in terms of its holiness
= state in which a countable entity is five in number
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= state in which an object has four sides of equal size
= state in which a countable entity is fifty in number

= linear measure, corresponding to the length of the forearm, from the tip of the middle finger to the point of the elbow; the exact measure is uncertain; apparently there were two standards: the normal, estimated as 44.5 cm; and the royal, estimated as 51.81 cm
= open land with enough grass and plants to graze cattle or flocks of sheep and goats
literally: measure; hence: = a part of a larger unit that has been measured off
= causative action by which humans mark off part of a larger unit for a certain purpose
= the greater or greatest of two or more dimensions of an object
= state in which a countable entity is five in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= place that has been consecrated to a deity, where that deity is said to reside and is worshiped
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= place that has been consecrated to a deity, where that deity is said to reside and is worshiped

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= place that has been consecrated to a deity, where that deity is said to reside and is worshiped
= place that has been consecrated to a deity, where that deity is said to reside and is worshiped
= state in which a countable entity is five in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= the greater or greatest of two or more dimensions of an object
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= state of ownership of land, including any buildings and population centers located on it, or slaves
= part of a building, enclosed by walls, floor, and ceiling
= state of ownership of land, including any buildings and population centers located on it, or slaves

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= state in which a countable entity is five in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= the greater or greatest of two or more dimensions of an object

= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= state of ownership of land, including any buildings and population centers located on it, or slaves

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= one of the sides or corners of an object
literally: the sea; = a cardinal direction pointing towards the west, ◄ which, in Israel, is the direction towards the Mediterranean Sea
literally: the sea; = a cardinal direction pointing towards the west, ◄ which, in Israel, is the direction towards the Mediterranean Sea
= one of the sides or corners of an object
= the greater or greatest of two or more dimensions of an object
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= one part of an object (or range of objects) that has been divided into several portions
= a set of limits that separates part of a whole from other parts, with focus either on the limits itself or on the area or object surrounded by it
literally: the sea; = a cardinal direction pointing towards the west, ◄ which, in Israel, is the direction towards the Mediterranean Sea
= a set of limits that separates part of a whole from other parts, with focus either on the limits itself or on the area or object surrounded by it

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= state of ownership of land, including any buildings and population centers located on it, or slaves

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= causative action by which humans cause hardship to other humans

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= group of clans (מִשְׁפָּחָה) united by a common leader

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which a certain event has progressed long enough for it to be able to stop

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= to behave aggressively towards someone with which one has a relationship; ► usually in order to enrich oneself in one way or another
= action by which humans or wild animals attack other humans and kill, destroy and steal in the process
= practices that conform to the laws of God

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
literally: to lift up; hence: = causative process by which humans are forced to stop engaging in an activity
= causative action by which people are expelled from their property or dwelling place
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= contraption consisting of rod held by a cord in the middle and with pans attached to both ends; ► used for weighing objects; sometimes used figuratively in expressions describing people's status or integrity or the seriousness of a situation in terms of weight
= state in which a weight or measure is correct or accurate, in accordance with a standard
= a unit of dry measure of which the exact quantity is unknown and ranges between 20 and 40 liters; one ephah equals 10 omer (עֹמֶר)
= state in which a weight or measure is correct or accurate, in accordance with a standard
= a unit of liquid measure of which the exact quantity is unknown and ranges between 20 and 40 liters; 1 bath corresponds to 1 ephah (אֵיפָה) dry measure
= state in which a weight or measure is correct or accurate, in accordance with a standard
= a unit of dry measure of which the exact quantity is unknown and ranges between 20 and 40 liters; one ephah equals 10 omer (עֹמֶר)
= a unit of liquid measure of which the exact quantity is unknown and ranges between 20 and 40 liters; 1 bath corresponds to 1 ephah (אֵיפָה) dry measure
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
literally: to hold; hence: = state in which an object or space is large enough to contain people or objects
= unit of measure of 220 liters or 6 bushels; equals 10 ephah (אֵיפָה) and 100 omer (עֹמֶר)
= a unit of liquid measure of which the exact quantity is unknown and ranges between 20 and 40 liters; 1 bath corresponds to 1 ephah (אֵיפָה) dry measure
= unit of measure of 220 liters or 6 bushels; equals 10 ephah (אֵיפָה) and 100 omer (עֹמֶר)
= a unit of dry measure of which the exact quantity is unknown and ranges between 20 and 40 liters; one ephah equals 10 omer (עֹמֶר)
= unit of measure of 220 liters or 6 bushels; equals 10 ephah (אֵיפָה) and 100 omer (עֹמֶר)

= a weight of approximately 0.6 grams; according to the standards of the sanctuary, 20 gerahs (גֵּרָה) make up 1 shekel (שֶׁקֶל) and 10 gerahs (גֵּרָה) make up 1 beka (בֶּקַע) ► used for weighing gold and silver
= state in which a countable entity is five in number
= state in which a countable entity is five in number
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: to lift up; hence: = causative action by which humans devote certain things to a deity
= state in which an entity is one out of six equal parts
= a unit of dry measure of which the exact quantity is unknown and ranges between 20 and 40 liters; one ephah equals 10 omer (עֹמֶר)
= unit of measure of 220 liters or 6 bushels; equals 10 ephah (אֵיפָה) and 100 omer (עֹמֶר)
= cereal plant bearing dense four sided spike of grain; ◄ Triticum; ► important source of flour for bread; ≈ its color used to be regarded as the ideal color for the skin
= to divide an object into six parts and take one part
= a unit of dry measure of which the exact quantity is unknown and ranges between 20 and 40 liters; one ephah equals 10 omer (עֹמֶר)
= unit of measure of 220 liters or 6 bushels; equals 10 ephah (אֵיפָה) and 100 omer (עֹמֶר)

= a type of cultivated grass like wheat or rice; less than 1 m tall; it produces a single head on each stalk, with rows of kernels; ◄ Hordeum distichum or Hordeum vulgare; ► its grain was used to make bread or beer, or for animal feed
= a certain quantity of food items, that someone in authority has ordered to be given to individuals or groups of people on a regular basis

= high quality oil (שֶׁמֶן) ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness
= a unit of liquid measure of which the exact quantity is unknown and ranges between 20 and 40 liters; 1 bath corresponds to 1 ephah (אֵיפָה) dry measure

= high quality oil (שֶׁמֶן) ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness
= a unit of liquid measure of which the exact quantity is unknown and ranges between 20 and 40 liters; 1 bath corresponds to 1 ephah (אֵיפָה) dry measure
= a unit of both dry and liquid measure of approximately 220 liters; equals 1 homer (חֹמֶר)
= a unit of liquid measure of which the exact quantity is unknown and ranges between 20 and 40 liters; 1 bath corresponds to 1 ephah (אֵיפָה) dry measure
= unit of measure of 220 liters or 6 bushels; equals 10 ephah (אֵיפָה) and 100 omer (עֹמֶר)
= a unit of liquid measure of which the exact quantity is unknown and ranges between 20 and 40 liters; 1 bath corresponds to 1 ephah (אֵיפָה) dry measure
= unit of measure of 220 liters or 6 bushels; equals 10 ephah (אֵיפָה) and 100 omer (עֹמֶר)
= male or female herbivorous mammal with four legs; ◄ |iovis ladicaudata|i*, fat tailed sheep; ► clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, hides, wool, and horns
= state in which a countable entity is one in number

= group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= an offering consisting of grain or a grain product, which usually accompanies an animal sacrifice

= causative action by which a priest performs the rituals that are required to remove guilt or uncleanness from people or objects, which usually requires a blood sacrifice, or another form of compensation
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= an offering consisting of grain or a grain product, which usually accompanies an animal sacrifice
= action by which humans pour out a liquid, such as wine (יַיִן) oil (שֶׁמֶן) or even blood (דָּם) before a deity ► as a sacrifice
= celebration, usually of a religious nature; ≈ associated with joy
= religious celebration at the appearance of the new moon, i.e. at the beginning of the month
= a festival that is celebrated at fixed times
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
literally: to make (ready); hence: = causative action by which humans take an object and do what needs to be done to make it ready for a certain purpose

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= action by which a human being performs the sacrificial ritual that is intended to remove the state of guilt from oneself or someone else

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= an offering consisting of grain or a grain product, which usually accompanies an animal sacrifice

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= causative action by which a priest performs the rituals that are required to remove guilt or uncleanness from people or objects, which usually requires a blood sacrifice, or another form of compensation

Node.gloss: for the sake of|for the benefit of
Node.definition: = relation denoting that someone performs a certain event for the benefit of someone or something else
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range
= state in which a countable entity is the first in a range
= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon
= young male bovine; ► clean, used as sacrifice; ≈ associated with power and strength, but also with violence and aggression and therefore often used to denote people who behave as such
= direct offspring of animals, either male or indeterminate

= large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth
= causative action by which a human being performs the ritual of removing the state of guilt or uncleanness from another person or object

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= place that has been consecrated to a deity, where that deity is said to reside and is worshiped
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

= red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of life (נֶפֶשׁ) human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land
= action by which a human being performs the sacrificial ritual that is intended to remove the state of guilt from oneself or someone else
= upright part of a door frame; a few passages mention square door frames and in such cases the horizontal elements are also referred to as doorposts

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= state in which a countable entity is four in number
= construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices
= upright part of a door frame; a few passages mention square door frames and in such cases the horizontal elements are also referred to as doorposts
= area enclosed by walls or buildings

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon
= action by which humans act wrongly, though without the intention to do so
= person who is easily influenced by other people, ideas or one's own passions; ◄ because of his/her lack of wisdom and experience
= causative action by which priests remove uncleanness from a sanctuary and its furnishings by performing the rituals that are required to achieve that, so that they can function again as they should

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range
= state in which a countable entity is four in number

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon
= celebration, usually of a religious nature; ≈ associated with joy
see שֶׁבַע

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= thin cracker like bread made without yeast
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
literally: to make (ready); hence: = causative action by which humans take an object and do what needs to be done to make it ready for a certain purpose

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= action by which a human being performs the sacrificial ritual that is intended to remove the state of guilt from oneself or someone else

= a fairly small, male domestic animal, usually black and with floppy ears, hooves and long hair, and usually found in one single flock (צֹאן) with sheep; ► raised for its hair, often used for sacrifices; a clean animal, and therefore to be eaten

= a fairly small, female domestic animal, usually black and with floppy ears, hooves and relatively short hair, and usually found in one single flock (צֹאן) with sheep; ► raised for its milk, meat, and skin; a clean animal and therefore to be eaten

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= an offering consisting of grain or a grain product, which usually accompanies an animal sacrifice
= a unit of dry measure of which the exact quantity is unknown and ranges between 20 and 40 liters; one ephah equals 10 omer (עֹמֶר)
= young male bovine; ► clean, used as sacrifice; ≈ associated with power and strength, but also with violence and aggression and therefore often used to denote people who behave as such
= a unit of dry measure of which the exact quantity is unknown and ranges between 20 and 40 liters; one ephah equals 10 omer (עֹמֶר)

= male herbivorous mammal with four legs; ◄ |iovis ladicaudata|i*, fat tailed sheep; ► clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, hides, wool, and horns; ≈ associated with strength and leadership

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

= high quality oil (שֶׁמֶן) ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness
= a unit of liquid measure of about 6 liters or 6 quarts; 4 hin make up 1 bath (בַּת)
= a unit of dry measure of which the exact quantity is unknown and ranges between 20 and 40 liters; one ephah equals 10 omer (עֹמֶר)
= state in which a countable entity is the seventh in a range

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon
= celebration, usually of a religious nature; ≈ associated with joy
literally: to make (ready); hence: = causative action by which humans take an object and do what needs to be done to make it ready for a certain purpose
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= action by which a human being performs the sacrificial ritual that is intended to remove the state of guilt from oneself or someone else
= an offering consisting of grain or a grain product, which usually accompanies an animal sacrifice

= high quality oil (שֶׁמֶן) ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness
